products.title: Tower Lineman's Safety Class III Harness
products.description: Professional-grade safety harness designed specifically for tower work and linemen. Built to ANSI Z359.1 standards with enhanced comfort and durability for extended wear during electrical work.

products.title: Oil Rigging Flash Fire Chemical Class III Safety Harness
products.description: Specialized safety harness designed for hazardous environments including oil rigging operations. Features flash fire and chemical resistance while maintaining full ANSI compliance for maximum protection.

products.title: Rescue Command Tactical Safety Harness
products.description: The most advanced rescue harness in the world built into a tactical vest. Designed to give you the ability to swiftly transport yourself and your equipment during rescue operations and tactical missions.

products.title: Fall Master Tech Class III Safety Harness
products.description: Advanced technical safety harness engineered for professional applications requiring maximum protection and comfort. Features innovative design for extended wear and superior safety performance.

products.title: Elite Rappelling Harness
products.description: Lightweight and durable rappelling harness designed for tactical operations and recreational climbing. Features ergonomic design for maximum comfort during extended use.

products.title: Professional Rigger's Belt
products.description: Heavy-duty rigger's belt made from 1-3/4" nylon webbing rated at 7,000-lbs tensile strength. Includes forged steel components and parachute-grade hardware for maximum reliability.

products.title: Load-Bearing Construction Duty Belt
products.description: Heavy-duty construction belt designed for professionals who need to carry tools and equipment safely while maintaining fall protection compliance.

products.title: 300ft Rope Deployment Bag
products.description: Professional rope deployment bag designed to organize and deploy up to 300 feet of rope quickly and efficiently during rescue and tactical operations.

products.title: Tactical Escape Belt
products.description: Compact escape belt designed for emergency situations and tactical operations. Lightweight yet strong enough for reliable emergency use.

collections.title: Construction & Industrial
collections.description: Professional-grade safety harnesses designed for construction workers, linemen, and industrial applications. Built to exceed OSHA standards with enhanced comfort for all-day wear.

collections.title: Military & Tactical
collections.description: Advanced tactical safety systems designed for military personnel, law enforcement, and emergency responders. Features low-profile designs for high-mobility operations.

collections.title: Recreation & Sports
collections.description: Lightweight and ergonomic harnesses optimized for climbing, rappelling, and adventure sports. Designed for comfort and performance during recreational activities.

collections.title: Rescue & Emergency
collections.description: Specialized equipment for first responders and rescue personnel. Built for rapid deployment and reliable performance in critical situations.

taglines: Meets ANSI and government agency standards
